isis.stitle: 530 and DT-466/408 Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1993) - ENGINE PERFORMANCE ANALYSIS GUIDES - ENGINE TEST NOMENCLATURE - EXHAUST BACK PRESSURE

svcproc.title: EXHAUST BACK PRESSURE
svcproc.para: Exhaust back pressure is the measurement of the restriction introduced by the exhaust piping. Excessive restriction will create high back pressure, a rise in engine temperature, shorten valve life and lower horsepower. Pressure Test Kit Model 200, (ZTSE-2239), or a manometer can be used for this test to measure exhaust backpressure in inches of water.
